RMC offers a wide range of equipment for walk-up (first come, first served) use, as well as a selection of high-end equipment that requires a bit of training before making a reservation.

Not sure what you need? Don’t worry! Our helpful desk staff can always assist. Visit us on the 3rd floor of Clemons Library, email teachlearn@virginia.edu, or call 434-924-7474.

If you're not sure which video camera to borrow, take a look at our comparison information to help you decide!

Walk-up Equipment

Equipment available on-demand includes a variety of cameras, microphones, digital recorders, and much more.

Come visit the Robertson Media Center on the 3rd floor of Clemons Library, you never know what you’ll discover!

Browse the walk-up equipment collection

Reservable equipment*

RMC also loans out high-end equipment for those times when only the best will do. This specialty equipment *requires some training before you can check it out, but the process is easy and RMC’s helpful staff can happily connect you to the tutorials required.
